repo.name: alpaca
repo.description: ALPACA is a caller for genomic variants (single nucleotide and small indels) from next-generation sequencing data that uses a novel algebraic approach to incorporate sample based filtering into the calling. This allows to intuitively control the FDR for arbitrary filtering scenarios.

repo.name: nivo
repo.description: nivo provides a rich set of dataviz components, built on top of the awesome d3 and Reactjs libraries

repo.name: reqwest
repo.description: An easy and powerful Rust HTTP Client

repo.name: docker-php-extension-installer
repo.description: Easily install PHP extension in Docker containers
